root.name: Legends of Exidia
root.description: 800 Nintendo DSi PointsOfficial Description An army of demons, the Morgost, has invaded Exidia. They have defeated Princess Sofia and captured the Orb of Spell. Their intentions are dark: the resurrection of the almighty Daraka. Listen only to your courage and help Sofia drive back this threat. As a fearless warrior, you'll fight the most evil creatures and, with every quest, you'll get closer to discovering the source of the plague. - All the greatness of an authentic action RPG: use your ancient sword or perform spells, and make your attacks more powerful thanks to the level-up system. - An epic adventure: 26 main characters and 30 side quests through 22 varied environments to explore, from the Elf forest to the city of Minasdril, the temple of Santinor, and more. - Tons of items, weapons and armors to find: the hero's equipment will change his appearance and abilities -Amazing production: polished isometric 3D graphics and a soundtrack inspiring heroism and mythical legends
